name: ems
author: Synthetic Semantics <info@synsem.com>
description: Shared Memory Parallelism with Transactional Memory and Extended Memory Semantics

scripts.install: node-gyp configure; node-gyp build; pushd node_modules && ln -s ../ ems && popd
scripts.test: cd Tests && rm -f EMSthreadStub.js && for test in `ls *js`; do  node $test 16; done
